sense.def:
To hope that something is true or will happen
pomeni želeti si, da bi bilo nekaj res ali bi se zgodilo.

seg.quote: She hoped she wasn't going to cry.
I sat down, hoping to remain unnoticed.
He paused, hoping for evidence of interest.
‘You haven't lost the ticket, have you?’—‘I hope not.’

sense.def:
Hope
je zaupanje, da se bo tisto, kar želimo, zgodilo.

seg.quote: She never completely gave up hope.

sense.def:
Kadar obstaja
a hope of something happening
, se bo verjetno zgodilo tisto, kar si želimo.

seg.quote: Co-operation is the only hope for progress.

sense.def:
Če nekaj storimo
in the hope of achieving a particular thing
, tisto storimo zato, ker želimo tisto doseči.

seg.quote: Tourists were waiting outside the palace in the hope of getting a look at the king.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
raises one's hopes
, v nas vzbudi občutek, da se bo zgodilo tisto, kar si želimo.

seg.quote: The new agreement raised hopes for conditions of prosperity.
